entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Colville Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. POP 30%
